result.execSummary:
Robin F Sewrey was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Robin F Sewrey was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robin F Sewrey

defendant.name: Sewrey, Robin F
defendant.address: 515 W Moreland Blvd, c/o Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188

records.addlTxt: Review hearing on July 25, 2022 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Robin F Sewrey
Current: 515 W Moreland Blvd, c/o Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188 United States  (Effective: 06-24-2022)
Prior: 413 Gambrell Rd, Townville, SC 29689

03:12 PM Defendant Robin F Sewrey in court, in custody, with attorney  State Public Defender Law Intern.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading. 
State of South Carolina is requesting extradition for Lewd Act on a Minor and Assault and Battery of a High and Aggravated Nature.
Court Conducts Waiver of Extradition Colloquy with the defendant.
Defendant waives his right to extraditions.
Court accepts the waiver of extradition.
The State presents bail arguments.
The Defense presents bail arguments.
THE COURT REMANDS THE DEFENDANT INTO THE CUSTODY OF THE WAUKESHA COUNTY JAIL.

Parties and the court sign the waiver of extradition.
Court also signed the Order for Commitment.

State of South Carolina is to be notified ASAP that the defendant is available for pick up.
If the defendant is picked up by the next court date the review hearing will be cancelled - If not picked up the court will address setting bail.6  Review hearing scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 09:00 am.
WARRANT FOR COMMITMENT, signed by CC Herring on 06/23/2022.
